---
title: "RSS Feed Aggregator"
date: today
---

```{r}
# https://medium.com/@vilcins/rss-feeds-for-your-github-releases-tags-and-activity-cbda2c51373
library(tidyRSS)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)

my_feeds1 <- c(
  "https://github.com/ropensci/targets/releases.atom",
  "https://github.com/ropensci/tarchetypes/releases.atom",
  "https://github.com/ropensci/gittargets/releases.atom"
)
rss_tbl1 <- my_feeds1 %>% 
  purrr::map_dfr(tidyRSS::tidyfeed) %>% 
  arrange(desc(entry_last_updated)) %>% 
  transmute(
    Date = lubridate::as_date(entry_last_updated), 
    Title = stringr::str_remove_all(feed_title, "Release notes from"), 
    entry_title, 
    entry_link
  )

rss_tbl2 <- tidyRSS::tidyfeed("https://www.tidyverse.org/index.xml")
rss_tbl3 <- tidyRSS::tidyfeed("https://albert-rapp.de/blog.xml")
```
